<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> &#42;U : NewGEP-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a411cf3e3932f209ce3374cb31adc1da6">users</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
